item.title: colophon
item.description: How this site was made, what it’s built with, and why I did it this way.
item.content:encoded:
This site is powered by Hugo, the static-site generator.

It runs a heavily modified version of the Archie theme. I started with Archie because it’s minimal and Markdown-inspired, but I have since changed it to match my tastes and uses.

I seriously considered going full motherfu*kingwebsite.com: just raw HTML and CSS, no build step, no JavaScript. It’s still tempting, but Hugo is stupidly fast, the templating is delightful, and I get to write everything in Markdown. So here we are.

Everything is written in my editor of choice, Neovim.

Technical details

  • Built with hugo --minify --gc
  • Zero JavaScript
  • Monospace system stack only: Menlo, Monaco, "Courier New", Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Lucida Console", monospace
  • Colors from the Everforest theme
  • Single CSS file
  • Images (rare) are .avif, compressed with ShortPixel
  • No web fonts, no cookies, no analytics, no trackers, no telemetry

Privacy should be the default, not a feature.

It loads instantly and wastes nothing.

Built with love, coffee, and the intent to keep things small.

item.description:
This page is an ever-changing collection of links I find interesting or want to read later.

photography

  • exif frame
    • settings (for my Powershot):
      • list: strap
      • template1: {ISO}- {F}- {SEC}
      • template2: PowerShot SD1200 IS
      • template3: [event, place - city?, smt]
      • template4: 6.2-18.6mm
      • export to jpeg
      • keep exif metadata
      • quality: 100%
    • settings (for my COOLPIX):
      • template2: COOLPIX L105
      • template4: 5.0-75.0mm
  • shortpixel image compression

clothing

  • uniqlo wide sweatpants
  • night lab fleece jacket
  • stussy trumpet zip-up

misc

  • f1 live
